summary: During WW2, convicted bank robber Eddie Chapman becomes a triple agent working for both the British and the Germans.
cast: Christopher Plummer|Romy Schneider|Trevor Howard|Gert Fröbe|Claudine Auger|Yul Brynner|Harry Meyen|Georges Lycan|Jess Hahn|John Abbey|Gil Barber|Jean-Claude Bercq|Paul Bonifas|Jean-Roger Caussimon|Annette Claudier|Jean Claudio|Pierre Collet|Anthony Dawson|Georges Douking|Colin Drake|Robert Favart|Fred Fisher|Bernard Fresson|Gisèle Grimm|Harvey Hall|Clément Harari|Jacques Harden|David Hutcheson|Marcel Journet|Morteza Kazerouni|Richard Larke|Robert Le Béal|Violette Marceau|Guy Marly|Jacques Mayar|Paul Mesnier|Charles Millot|Hubert Noël|Jean Ozenne|Marcel Roche|Albert Simono|Anthony Stuart|Michel Thomass|Edward Underdown|François Valorbe|Van Doude|Howard Vernon|Francis De Wolff|Jean-Pierre Zola|Jean-Marc Bory|Daniel Crohem|Gordon Jackson|Olivier L'Espagnol|Colin McKenzie|Jean Minisini|Laure Paillette|Frank Phillips|Robert Rietty|Jean Rupert|Jeff Silk|Sylvia Sorrente|Jean Vaudier
title: Triple Cross - La verdadera historia de Eddie Chapman
